trans-unit.source: Defines the contract for the basic state machine for all communication-oriented objects in the system, including channels, the channel managers, factories, listeners, and dispatchers, and service hosts.
trans-unit.target: システム内のチャネル、チャネル マネージャー、ファクトリ、リスナー、およびディスパッチャーを含むすべての通信指向オブジェクトとサービス ホストに対して使用する、基本ステート マシンのためのコントラクトを定義します。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> interface defines:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> インターフェイスは、以下を定義します。

trans-unit.source: A set of open, close and abort methods for initiating state transitions:
trans-unit.target: 状態遷移を開始する open、close、および abort メソッドのセット:

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous versions of the open and close methods:
trans-unit.target: open および close メソッドの非同期バージョン:

trans-unit.source: A set of events that provide notifications of state transitions:
trans-unit.target: 状態遷移の通知を提供するイベント セット:

trans-unit.source: A common <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.State%2A> property for inspecting the state of an object
trans-unit.target: オブジェクトの状態を検査するための共通 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.State%2A> プロパティ

trans-unit.source: Causes a communication object to transition immediately from its current state into the closed state.
trans-unit.target: 通信オブジェクトを、現在の状態から Closed 状態に直ちに遷移させます。

trans-unit.source: This method indicates that any unfinished work should be ignored or ungracefully terminated before returning.
trans-unit.target: このメソッドは、戻る前に、終了していない作業を無視するか、または異常終了させるかを指定します。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Abort%2A> method can be used to cancel any outstanding operations, including outstanding calls to <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Abort%2A> メソッドは、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> 呼び出しの保留など、保留状態の操作のキャンセルに使用できます。

trans-unit.source: To gracefully transition an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> state to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> state call <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> を <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> 状態から <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> 状態に正常に遷移させるには、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> を呼び出します。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to close a communication object.
trans-unit.target: 通信オブジェクトをクローズするための非同期操作を開始します。

trans-unit.source: This method causes an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> to gracefully transition from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> state to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> state.
trans-unit.target: このメソッドは、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> を <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> 状態から <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> 状態に正常に遷移させます。

trans-unit.source: Versions with and without an explicit timeout are provided.
trans-unit.target: 明示的なタイムアウトを持つバージョンと持たないバージョンが提供されます。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: 非同期のクローズ操作の完了通知を受信する <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> デリゲート。

trans-unit.source: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: 非同期のクローズ操作に関連付けられている状態情報を保持する、アプリケーションで指定されたオブジェクト。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to close a communication object.
trans-unit.target: 通信オブジェクトをクローズするための非同期操作を開始します。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: 非同期の close 操作を参照する <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: This method causes an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> to gracefully transition from any state, other than the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> state to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> state.
trans-unit.target: このメソッドは、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> を、<xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> 以外の状態から <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> 状態に正常に遷移させます。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose%2A> method allows any unfinished work to be completed before returning.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose%2A> メソッドにより、戻る前に未完了の作業を完了できます。

trans-unit.source: For example, finish sending any buffered messages).
trans-unit.target: たとえば、バッファー内のメッセージの送信を完了します)。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose" /> was called on an object in the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose" /> が、<see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> 状態のオブジェクトで呼び出されました。

trans-unit.source: The default timeout elapsed before the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> was able to close gracefully.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> を正常にクローズする前に、既定のタイムアウトが経過しました。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that specifies how long the send operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: 送信操作を完了する必要がある、タイムアウトまでの制限時間を指定する <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: 非同期のクローズ操作の完了通知を受信する <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> デリゲート。

trans-unit.source: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: 非同期のクローズ操作に関連付けられている状態情報を保持する、アプリケーションで指定されたオブジェクト。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to close a communication object with a specified timeout.
trans-unit.target: タイムアウトを指定して、通信オブジェクトをクローズするための非同期操作を開始します。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: 非同期の close 操作を参照する <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: This method causes an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> to gracefully transition from any state, other than the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> state to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> state with in a specified interval of time.
trans-unit.target: このメソッドは、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> を、<xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> 以外の状態から <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> 状態に、指定した時間内で正常に遷移させます。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose%2A> method allows any unfinished work to be completed before returning.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose%2A> メソッドにより、戻る前に未完了の作業を完了できます。

trans-unit.source: For example, finish sending any buffered messages).
trans-unit.target: たとえば、バッファー内のメッセージの送信を完了します)。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose" /> was called on an object in the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose" /> が、<see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> 状態のオブジェクトで呼び出されました。

trans-unit.source: The specified timeout elapsed before the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> was able to close gracefully.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> を正常にクローズする前に、指定したタイムアウトが経過しました。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to close a communication object.
trans-unit.target: 通信オブジェクトをクローズするための非同期操作を開始します。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginOpen%2A> method causes an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> to enter into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opening> state where it remains until its transition to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> state is completed or fails.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginOpen%2A> メソッドは、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> を <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opening> 状態に遷移させ、<xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> 状態への遷移が完了するか失敗するまでその状態を保ちます。

trans-unit.source: Versions with and without an explicit timeout are provided.
trans-unit.target: 明示的なタイムアウトを持つバージョンと持たないバージョンが提供されます。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous open operation.
trans-unit.target: 非同期の open 操作の完了通知を受信する <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> デリゲート。

trans-unit.source: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous open operation.
trans-unit.target: 非同期のオープン操作に関連付けられている状態情報を保持する、アプリケーションで指定されたオブジェクト。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to open a communication object.
trans-unit.target: 通信オブジェクトを開くための非同期操作を開始します。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references the asynchronous open operation.
trans-unit.target: 非同期の open 操作を参照する <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is instantiated, it begins in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> がインスタンス化されると、<xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> 状態で開始します。

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> state, the object can be configured (for example, properties can be set, or events can be registered), but it is not yet usable to send or receive messages.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> 状態の場合、オブジェクトを構成する (プロパティの設定やイベントの登録など) ことはできますが、メッセージの送受信にはまだ使用できません。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginOpen%2A> method causes an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> to enter into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opening> state where it remains until the open operation succeeds, the open operation times out or fails and the object becomes faulted, or the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is aborted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginOpen%2A> メソッドは、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> を <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opening> 状態に遷移させ、オープン操作が完了するまでその状態を保ちます。オープン操作がタイムアウトするか失敗すると、オブジェクトがエラーになる、または <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> が中止されます。

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> state, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is usable (for example, messages can be received), but it is no longer configurable.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> 状態では、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> は使用可能ですが (たとえば、メッセージは受信できます)、構成可能ではなくなります。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> was unable to be opened and has entered the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> が開きません。<see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> 状態に遷移しました。

trans-unit.source: The default open timeout elapsed before the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> was able to enter the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened" /> state and has entered the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> が <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened" /> 状態に入る前に既定の open タイムアウトが経過しました。<see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> 状態に遷移しました。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that specifies how long the send operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: 送信操作を完了する必要がある、タイムアウトまでの制限時間を指定する <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous open operation.
trans-unit.target: 非同期の open 操作の完了通知を受信する <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> デリゲート。

trans-unit.source: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous open operation.
trans-unit.target: 非同期のオープン操作に関連付けられている状態情報を保持する、アプリケーションで指定されたオブジェクト。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to open a communication object within a specified interval of time.
trans-unit.target: 指定した時間内で通信オブジェクトを開くための非同期操作を開始します。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references the asynchronous open operation.
trans-unit.target: 非同期の open 操作を参照する <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is instantiated, it begins in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> がインスタンス化されると、<xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> 状態で開始します。

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> state, the object can be configured (for example, properties can be set, or events can be registered), but it is not yet usable to send or receive messages.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> 状態の場合、オブジェクトを構成する (プロパティの設定やイベントの登録など) ことはできますが、メッセージの送受信にはまだ使用できません。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A> method causes an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> to enter into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opening> state where it remains until the open operation succeeds, the open operation times out or fails and the object becomes faulted, or the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is aborted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A> メソッドは、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> を <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opening> 状態に遷移させ、オープン操作が完了するまでその状態を保ちます。オープン操作がタイムアウトするか失敗すると、オブジェクトがエラーになる、または <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> が中止されます。

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> state, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is usable (for example, messages can be received), but it is no longer configurable.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> 状態では、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> は使用可能ですが (たとえば、メッセージは受信できます)、構成可能ではなくなります。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> was unable to be opened and has entered the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> が開きません。<see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> 状態に遷移しました。

trans-unit.source: The specified timeout elapsed before the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> was able to enter the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened" /> state and has entered the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> が <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened" /> 状態に入る前に指定したタイムアウトが経過しました。<see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> 状態に遷移しました。

trans-unit.source: The operation must throw a <see cref="T:System.TimeoutException" /> if the specified <paramref name="timeout" /> is exceeded.
trans-unit.target: この操作では指定の <see cref="T:System.TimeoutException" /> を超えた場合に <paramref name="timeout" /> をスローする必要があります。

trans-unit.source: Causes a communication object to transition from its current state into the closed state.
trans-unit.target: 通信オブジェクトを、現在の状態から Closed 状態に遷移させます。

trans-unit.source: Causes a communication object to transition from its current state into the closed state.
trans-unit.target: 通信オブジェクトを、現在の状態から Closed 状態に遷移させます。

trans-unit.source: This method causes an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> to gracefully transition from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> state to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> state.
trans-unit.target: このメソッドは、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> を <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> 状態から <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> 状態に正常に遷移させます。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> method allows any unfinished work to be completed before returning.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> メソッドにより、戻る前に未完了の作業を完了できます。

trans-unit.source: For example, finish sending any buffered messages).
trans-unit.target: たとえば、バッファー内のメッセージの送信を完了します)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> enters the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closing> state and remains in it until the transition to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> state is completed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> は <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closing> 状態に入り、<xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> 状態への遷移が完了するまでその状態を保ちます。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> returns once the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> state is reached.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> は、<xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> 状態に達した後で返ります。

trans-unit.source: If the default close timeout elapses before the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is able to close gracefully, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is aborted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> を正常にクローズする前に既定の close タイムアウトが経過した場合、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> は中止されます。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> is called on an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opening>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted> state, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is aborted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> 状態、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> 状態、または<xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> 状態にある <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opening> に対して <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted> が呼び出された場合、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> は中止されます。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> is called on an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closing> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> state, the call returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> 状態または <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> 状態にある <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closing> に対して <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> が呼び出された場合、その呼び出しは直ちに返ります。

trans-unit.source: There is also an asynchronous version of the close method that is initiated by calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose%2A> and completed by calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A>.
trans-unit.target: また、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose%2A> を呼び出して開始し、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> を呼び出して完了する close メソッドの非同期バージョンもあります。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close" /> was called on an object in the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close" /> が、<see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> 状態のオブジェクトで呼び出されました。

trans-unit.source: The default close timeout elapsed before the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> was able to close gracefully.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> を正常にクローズする前に、既定の close タイムアウトが経過しました。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that specifies how long the send operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: 送信操作を完了する必要がある、タイムアウトまでの制限時間を指定する <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />。

trans-unit.source: Causes a communication object to transition from its current state into the closed state.
trans-unit.target: 通信オブジェクトを、現在の状態から Closed 状態に遷移させます。

trans-unit.source: This method causes an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> to gracefully transition from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> state to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> state within a specified interval of time.
trans-unit.target: このメソッドは、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> を、指定した時間内で <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> 状態から <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> 状態に正常に遷移させます。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> method allows any unfinished work to be completed before returning.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> メソッドにより、戻る前に未完了の作業を完了できます。

trans-unit.source: For example, finish sending any buffered messages).
trans-unit.target: たとえば、バッファー内のメッセージの送信を完了します)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> enters the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closing> state and remains in it until the transition to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> state is completed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> は <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closing> 状態に入り、<xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> 状態への遷移が完了するまでその状態を保ちます。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> returns once the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> state is reached.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> は、<xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> 状態に達した後で返ります。

trans-unit.source: If the timeout elapses before the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is able to gracefully close, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is aborted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> を正常にクローズする前にタイムアウトが経過した場合、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> は中止されます。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> is called on an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opening>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted> state, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is aborted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> 状態、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> 状態、または<xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> 状態にある <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opening> に対して <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted> が呼び出された場合、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> は中止されます。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> is called on an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closing> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> state, the call returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> 状態または <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> 状態にある <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closing> に対して <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> が呼び出された場合、その呼び出しは直ちに返ります。

trans-unit.source: There is also an asynchronous version of the close method that is initiated by calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose%2A> and completed by calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A>.
trans-unit.target: また、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose%2A> を呼び出して開始し、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> を呼び出して完了する close メソッドの非同期バージョンもあります。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close" /> was called on an object in the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close" /> が、<see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> 状態のオブジェクトで呼び出されました。

trans-unit.source: The timeout elapsed before the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> was able to close gracefully.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> を正常にクローズする前に、タイムアウトが経過しました。

trans-unit.source: The operation must throw a <see cref="T:System.TimeoutException" /> if the specified <paramref name="timeout" /> is exceeded.
trans-unit.target: この操作では指定の <see cref="T:System.TimeoutException" /> を超えた場合に <paramref name="timeout" /> をスローする必要があります。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the communication object completes its transition from the closing state into the closed state.
trans-unit.target: 通信オブジェクトが、Closing 状態から Closed 状態への通信状態の遷移を完了したときに発生します。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the communication object first enters the closing state.
trans-unit.target: 通信オブジェクトが初めて Closing 状態に遷移するときに発生します。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the communication object first begins to transition from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> state into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> state, immediately after either the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose%2A> method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: このイベントは、<xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> メソッド、<xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> メソッドのいずれかが起動された直後、通信オブジェクトが最初に <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> 状態から <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose%2A> 状態への移行を開始したときに発生します。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that is returned by a call to the <see cref="Overload:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> メソッドへの呼び出しで返された <see cref="Overload:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose" />。

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous operation to close a communication object.
trans-unit.target: 通信オブジェクトをクローズするための非同期操作を完了します。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="Overload:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose" /> was called on an object in the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="Overload:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose" /> が、<see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> 状態のオブジェクトで呼び出されました。

trans-unit.source: The timeout elapsed before the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> was able to close gracefully.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> を正常にクローズする前に、タイムアウトが経過しました。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that is returned by a call to the <see cref="Overload:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginOpen" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> メソッドへの呼び出しで返された <see cref="Overload:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginOpen" />。

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous operation to open a communication object.
trans-unit.target: 通信オブジェクトをオープンするための非同期操作を完了します。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> was unable to be opened and has entered the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> が開きません。<see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> 状態に遷移しました。

trans-unit.source: The timeout elapsed before the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> was able to enter the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened" /> state and has entered the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> が <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened" /> 状態に入る前にタイムアウトが経過しました。<see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> 状態に遷移しました。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the communication object first enters the faulted state.
trans-unit.target: 通信オブジェクトが初めて Faulted 状態に遷移するときに発生します。

trans-unit.source: Causes a communication object to transition from the created state into the opened state.
trans-unit.target: 通信オブジェクトを、Created 状態から Opened 状態に遷移させます。

trans-unit.source: Versions with and without an explicit timeout are provided.
trans-unit.target: 明示的なタイムアウトを持つバージョンと持たないバージョンが提供されます。

trans-unit.source: Causes a communication object to transition from the created state into the opened state.
trans-unit.target: 通信オブジェクトを、Created 状態から Opened 状態に遷移させます。

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is instantiated, it begins in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> がインスタンス化されると、<xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> 状態で開始します。

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> state, the object can be configured (for example, properties can be set, or events can be registered), but it is not yet usable to send or receive messages.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> 状態の場合、オブジェクトを構成する (プロパティの設定やイベントの登録など) ことはできますが、メッセージの送受信にはまだ使用できません。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A> method causes an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> to enter into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opening> state where it remains until the open operation succeeds, the open operation times out or fails and the object becomes faulted, or the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is aborted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A> メソッドは、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> を <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opening> 状態に遷移させ、オープン操作が完了するまでその状態を保ちます。オープン操作がタイムアウトするか失敗すると、オブジェクトがエラーになる、または <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> が中止されます。

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> state, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is usable (for example, messages can be received), but it is no longer configurable.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> 状態では、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> は使用可能ですが (たとえば、メッセージは受信できます)、構成可能ではなくなります。

trans-unit.source: There is also an asynchronous version of the open method that is initiated by calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginOpen%2A> and completed by calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.EndOpen%28System.IAsyncResult%29>.
trans-unit.target: また、非同期バージョンの open メソッドがあります。これは、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginOpen%2A> の呼び出しで開始され、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.EndOpen%28System.IAsyncResult%29> の呼び出しで完了します。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> was unable to be opened and has entered the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> が開きません。<see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> 状態に遷移しました。

trans-unit.source: The default open timeout elapsed before the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> was able to enter the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened" /> state and has entered the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> が <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened" /> 状態に入る前に既定の open タイムアウトが経過しました。<see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> 状態に遷移しました。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that specifies how long the send operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: 送信操作を完了する必要がある、タイムアウトまでの制限時間を指定する <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />。

trans-unit.source: Causes a communication object to transition from the created state into the opened state within a specified interval of time.
trans-unit.target: 指定した時間内で、通信オブジェクトを Created 状態から Opened 状態に遷移させます。

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is instantiated, it begins in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> がインスタンス化されると、<xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> 状態で開始します。

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> state, the object can be configured (for example, properties can be set, or events can be registered), but it is not yet usable to send or receive messages.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> 状態の場合、オブジェクトを構成する (プロパティの設定やイベントの登録など) ことはできますが、メッセージの送受信にはまだ使用できません。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A> method causes an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> to enter into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opening> state where it remains until the open operation succeeds, the open operation times out or fails and the object becomes faulted, or the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is aborted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A> メソッドは、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> を <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opening> 状態に遷移させ、オープン操作が完了するまでその状態を保ちます。オープン操作がタイムアウトするか失敗すると、オブジェクトがエラーになる、または <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> が中止されます。

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> state, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is usable (for example, messages can be received), but it is no longer configurable.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> 状態では、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> は使用可能ですが (たとえば、メッセージは受信できます)、構成可能ではなくなります。

trans-unit.source: There is also an asynchronous version of the open method that is initiated by calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginOpen%2A> and completed by calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.EndOpen%28System.IAsyncResult%29>.
trans-unit.target: また、非同期バージョンの open メソッドがあります。これは、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginOpen%2A> の呼び出しで開始され、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.EndOpen%28System.IAsyncResult%29> の呼び出しで完了します。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> was unable to be opened and has entered the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> が開きません。<see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> 状態に遷移しました。

trans-unit.source: The specified timeout elapsed before the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> was able to enter the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened" /> state and has entered the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> が <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened" /> 状態に入る前に指定したタイムアウトが経過しました。<see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> 状態に遷移しました。

trans-unit.source: The operation must throw a <see cref="T:System.TimeoutException" /> if the specified <paramref name="timeout" /> is exceeded.
trans-unit.target: この操作では指定の <see cref="T:System.TimeoutException" /> を超えた場合に <paramref name="timeout" /> をスローする必要があります。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the communication object completes its transition from the opening state into the opened state.
trans-unit.target: 通信オブジェクトが、Opening 状態から Opened 状態への通信状態の遷移を完了したときに発生します。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the communication object first enters the opening state.
trans-unit.target: 通信オブジェクトが初めて Opening 状態に遷移するときに発生します。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the communication object first begins to transition from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> state into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> state, immediately after either the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginOpen%2A> method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: このイベントは、<xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> メソッド、<xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> メソッドのいずれかが起動された直後、通信オブジェクトが最初に <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A> 状態から <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginOpen%2A> 状態への移行を開始したときに発生します。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the communication-oriented object.
trans-unit.target: 通信指向オブジェクトの現在の状態を取得します。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState" /> of the object.
trans-unit.target: オブジェクトの <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState" /> の値。

trans-unit.source: The main communication states available to an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> are:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> で使用できるメイン通信状態を次に示します。

trans-unit.source: There are also transitory states that such an object can occupy when transitioning between the first three main states:
trans-unit.target: さらに、そのようなオブジェクトは、上に挙げた最初の 3 つのメイン状態の間を遷移するときに、次の遷移状態を取ることができます。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> defines the states that are valid for all communication-oriented objects in the system, including channels, listeners, the channel and listener factories, and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> class.
trans-unit.target: この <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> は、システム内のチャネル、リスナー、チャネル、チャネルとリスナーのファクトリを含むすべての通信指向オブジェクトと、<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> クラスの有効な状態を定義します。
